translation.en: -[woman] Loyal readers, -[keys clacking] my favorite holiday is just around the corner.
translation.it: Fedeli lettori, la mia festa preferita è dietro l'angolo.

translation.en: Christmas means joy, excitement, family, love and lights.
translation.it: Natale significa gioia, felicità, famiglia, amore e luci.

translation.en: It also means my first year as Queen of Aldovia
translation.it: Significa anche che il primo anno da regina di Aldovia

translation.en: is nearly under my belt.
And just... [inhales] Wow!
What a year.
Royal life has a way of transforming everything.
translation.it: La vita reale riesce a trasformare tutto.

translation.en: As the year began,
Richard and I enjoyed a magical honeymoon.
translation.it: io e Richard ci siamo goduti una magica luna di miele.

translation.en: Once home, our revised new Aldovia initiative continued to grow.
translation.it: Una volta a casa, la nostra nuova iniziativa di Aldovia continuò a crescere.

translation.en: And that's how we'll fund the tech center. And the new hospital.
translation.it: - Così finanzieremo il centro tecnologico. - E il nuovo ospedale.

translation.en: [Amber] And quickly began paying dividends.
translation.it: E presto iniziò a pagare i dividendi.

translation.en: As did my efforts to learn about Aldovia's history and families.
translation.it: Intanto, mi sono impegnata a studiare la storia e le famiglie di Aldovia.

translation.en: -That knowledge is very helpful -[indistinct chatter] at functions like Royal State dinners.
translation.it: Quella conoscenza è molto utile a funzioni come le cene reali.

translation.en: And the people of Aldovia are fully embracing
translation.it: E i cittadini di Aldovia hanno ormai accettato

translation.en: their Queen Amber of New York.
-[keys clacking] -This year has been super busy,
but next year is gonna be...
even busier.
-[applause] -[man] Richard, this way! [woman, yelling] Congratulations on the baby!
translation.it: - Richard, di qua! - Congratulazioni per il bambino!

translation.en: -[cameras shutter] -Over here!
[woman 2] Beautiful!
Have you chosen the baby's name?
[together] No.
-[laughter] -Are you expecting a boy or a girl?
-We haven't found out yet. -We're waiting to be surprised.
translation.it: - Non lo sappiamo ancora. - Vogliamo essere sorpresi.

translation.en: You've updated Aldovia's line of succession to include females.
translation.it: Avete aggiornato la linea di successione per includere le donne.

translation.en: Does that mean it's a girl? It means that we are hoping to bring Aldovia
translation.it: - Significa che è femmina? - No, che speriamo di portare Aldovia

translation.en: into the 21st Century culturally, just as the new Aldovia initiative
translation.it: nel 21° secolo culturalmente, come la nuova iniziativa ha fatto economicamente.

translation.en: -has done economically. -[clamoring]
translation.it: come la nuova iniziativa ha fatto economicamente.

translation.en: Will you at least tell us the baby's due date?
translation.it: Ci dite quand'è prevista la nascita?

translation.en: January the 11th.
Will you be taking time off?
-[Amber] Yes. -Starting in two days time,
following the centennial treaty signing with the Kingdom of Penglia.
translation.it: dal centenario della firma del trattato con il Regno di Penglia.

translation.en: Our last official duty of the year.
Now are there any policy questions, economic queries, foreign affairs?
translation.it: Ci sono domande sulla politica, l'economia, gli affari esteri?

translation.en: No. About the baby. Do you have any names to share?
translation.it: - No? - Riguardo il bambino, avete un nome?

translation.en: -[together] No. -[laughter]
Have you truly not chosen the name?
translation.it: Davvero non avete scelto il nome?

translation.en: You won't give up, will you?
Well, I'd be delighted to finally know what names you're considering.
translation.it: Sarei lieta di sapere quali nomi state considerando.

translation.en: We're not telling anyone, Mother. We're all family here.
translation.it: - Non lo diciamo a nessuno, mamma. - Ma siamo in famiglia.

translation.en: What Richard said.
-For a girl, I say Khaleesi. -Hermione is lovely as well.
translation.it: - Se è femmina, Khaleesi. - Anche Hermione è adorabile.

translation.en: Claudette is a family name I'm very fond of or Claude for a boy.
translation.it: Claudette è un nome di famiglia che amo, Claude per un maschio.

translation.en: Well, if it is a boy, I won't be offended if you decided to name him Simon,
translation.it: Se è maschio, non mi offenderei se decideste di chiamarlo Simon,

translation.en: or Simone for a girl, obviously.
All lovely names, we will take them under advisement.
translation.it: Tutti nomi adorabili, li terremo a mente.

translation.en: Your Majesty, in a few weeks' time when the baby arrives,
translation.it: Vostra Maestà, tra qualche settimana, quando arriverà il bambino,

translation.en: the surprise will be all the sweeter.
You always put things in perspective.
translation.it: Metti sempre le cose in prospettiva.

translation.en: I just hope I'm half as beautiful as Amber is when I become pregnant.
translation.it: Spero di essere bella la metà di Amber quando sarò incinta.

translation.en: That's an unsettling thought to put into your mother's head.
translation.it: È un pensiero inquietante da dare a tua madre.

translation.en: Not nearly as unsettling as your continued presence.
translation.it: Non è inquietante quanto la tua presenza.

translation.en: Your Majesties,
you have a guest.
I wonder who on Earth that could be.
Surprise!
-Melissa! -[Melissa laughs]
Oh, you look fantastic! -I feel like a watermelon. -[scoffs]
translation.it: - Ehi, stai benissimo! - Mi sento un'anguria.

translation.en: But it's so great that you could surprise me early for the baby shower.
translation.it: È fantastico che sia riuscita a venire per il baby shower.

translation.en: I am early, but that's not actually the surprise.
translation.it: Sono in anticipo, ma la sorpresa non è questa.

translation.en: Simon's invited me to stay through Christmas. [chuckles]
translation.it: Simon mi ha invitato qui per Natale.

translation.en: A fabulous idea, if I may say so.
Wow, great! [laughs] It's so good to see you.
Yeah. [laughs] You too. So, are you daddy ready?
translation.it: Già. Anche per me. Allora, sei pronto, papà?

translation.en: -Getting there, [exhales] I think. -[Melissa giggles]
Staying with someone's family over Christmas is a big deal.
translation.it: Il Natale in famiglia è importante.

translation.en: -She should've told us. -She wanted to surprise you.
She knows how you feel about Simon.
translation.it: - Sa cosa pensi di Simon. - Non mi fido.

translation.en: -[sighs] Well, I don't trust him. -No, neither do I.
translation.it: - Sa cosa pensi di Simon. - Non mi fido. Neppure io, ma è stato bravo tutto l'anno.

translation.en: He has behaved all year.
translation.it: Neppure io, ma è stato bravo tutto l'anno.

translation.en: In the hope that we'll give him an official position. Which we haven't.
translation.it: - Perché vuole un incarico ufficiale. - Non gliel'abbiamo dato.

translation.en: [stammers] I just don't want Melissa to get hurt. Let them be.
translation.it: - Non voglio che Melissa ci resti male. - Lasciali stare.

translation.en: We have more important issues to attend to.
translation.it: Abbiamo cose più importanti di cui occuparci.

translation.en: Like my birth plan. And the baby's musical enrichment.
translation.it: - Come il mio piano di nascita. - E l'arricchimento musicale del bambino.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure research debunked the myth
translation.it: La ricerca ha sfatato il mito

translation.en: that classical music makes your baby smarter.
translation.it: che la musica classica rende il bambino più intelligente.

translation.en: Classical music makes everybody smarter,
which I need to be to build this crib.
translation.it: e io devo costruire questa culla.

translation.en: Instruction manual's more complicated than differential calculus.
translation.it: Il manuale è più complicato del calcolo differenziale.

translation.en: -[man] Taxi! -[indistinct chatter]
Hey, Pop.
Hey Peanut. I'm almost packed.
What's cracking in Aldovania?
You still can't say it right.
Pack warmly, it's cold here.
Now why couldn't you marry the king of some tropical paradise?
translation.it: Perché non hai sposato il re di un paradiso tropicale?

translation.en: -She sunburns too easily. -[Amber chuckles]
Did you figure out how long you can stay yet?
Gus is gonna cover the diner,
translation.it: Gus mi sostituirà alla tavola calda,

translation.en: so I can stay from the baby shower all the way until little Rudy's birth.
translation.it: così posso stare dalla festa fino alla nascita del piccolo Rudy.

translation.en: -Pardon me? -Oops! Sorry.
Prince Rudy's birth.
-Pop! -Hey, I'm just saying.
Amber, what are you doing out here? It's so cold.
translation.it: Amber, che fai fuori? C'è freddo.

translation.en: -Just getting some air. -You should've woken me up.
translation.it: - Prendo un po' d'aria. - Potevi svegliarmi.

translation.en: You need your sleep. You know, when the baby comes.
translation.it: Devi di dormire. Per quando nascerà il bambino.

translation.en: What do you have there?
Nothing.
Don't judge my cravings. [chuckles]
Never.
What do they call it? Sympathetic weight gain syndrome?
translation.it: Com'era? Sindrome comprensiva da aumento di peso?

translation.en: Don't tattle to Dr. Magoro. I'm supposed to watch my sugars.
translation.it: Non fare la spia con la dottoressa. Devo limitare gli zuccheri.

translation.en: You have my word.
[Dr. Magoro] Fetal heart rate excellent.
Amniotic fluid levels superb.
-Your baby is beautiful. -[Richard chuckles]
Going forward, anything special we should do?
translation.it: Andando avanti, c'è qualcosa di speciale da fare?

translation.en: Avoid special as much as possible.
Queen Amber needs her rest and relaxation, nothing more.
translation.it: La regina Amber ha bisogno di riposo e relax, nient'altro.

translation.en: -That sounds ideal. -[door opens]
Hello, can we get a peek?
I'd love to see my little grandchild. Can you print a copy for auntie Mel?
translation.it: - Vorrei vedere mio nipote. - Può stamparne una copia per zia Mel?

translation.en: If you want to know if it's a boy or a girl, you'll be disappointed.
translation.it: Se volete sapere il sesso, resterete deluse.

translation.en: -Foiled again. -[Richard chuckles]
Try harder next time.
translation.it: Impegnati di più la prossima volta.

translation.en: Just what the doctor ordered.
Nothing is more important right now -than time to ourselves. -[thud]
translation.it: Niente è più importante del tempo per noi stessi.

translation.en: To quote your sister, I'm not a china doll.
translation.it: Per citare tua sorella, non sono una bambola di porcellana.

translation.en: No, you're far more valuable.
I want you both to have the best of everything, including sleigh rides.
translation.it: Voglio che abbiate il meglio di tutto, gite in slitta incluse.

translation.en: I've been thinking, and I want this baby to have a normal life, as normal as possible.
translation.it: Pensavo che voglio che questo bambino abbia una vita normale, il più possibile.

translation.en: Our child will be heir to the Kingdom.
translation.it: Nostro figlio sarà erede del regno.

translation.en: Still, I went to public school, I played with neighborhood kids.
translation.it: Ho fatto le scuole pubbliche, giocavo coi ragazzini di quartiere.

translation.en: I went to boarding school and played polo.
translation.it: Ho fatto il collegio e giocavo a polo.

translation.en: I was riding a subway by myself when I was ten, and I ate diner food.
translation.it: A dieci anni andavo sola in metro e mangiavo alla tavola calda.

translation.en: I had nannies to make sure I ate my vegetables.
translation.it: Le tate mi facevano mangiare le verdure.

translation.en: -I turned out all right. -So did I.
We'll find a new definition of normal together.
-No boarding school. -No boarding school.
[inhales] But no subway riding, either.
Well, luckily for you, Aldovia doesn't have a subway.
translation.it: Per tua fortuna, Aldovia non ha la metropolitana.

translation.en: Your Majesties,
with an eye to the Penglians' official visit and treaty signing
translation.it: riguardo alla visita ufficiale dei pengliani, affinché il trattato

translation.en: proceeding as smoothly as possible,
we feel a review is prudent.
translation.it: pensiamo sia prudente fare una revisione.

translation.en: Thank you for making the time.
translation.it: Grazie di aver trovato il tempo.

translation.en: Well, this is the last of the time you will get of our Queen,
translation.it: Questa è l'ultima volta che la vostra regina ve ne darà,

translation.en: for the rest of the year will be dedicated exclusively
translation.it: il resto dell'anno sarà dedicato esclusivamente

translation.en: to the preparations for the birth of the royal baby.
translation.it: ai preparativi per la nascita del royal baby.

translation.en: Of course.
Mr. Little.
The centennial treaty
renews an ancient truce between Aldovia and Penglia
translation.it: rinnova un'antica tregua tra Aldovia e Penglia

translation.en: that dates back to a war 600 years ago.
translation.it: che risale a una guerra di 600 anni fa.

translation.en: That was the war over Silk Road trading routes, right?
translation.it: La guerra per le rotte commerciali della Valle della Seta?

translation.en: You've studied your history, Queen Amber.
[Mr. Little] It was a fearsome and brutal war with no end in sight.
translation.it: Fu una guerra terribile e brutale senza fine in vista.

translation.en: -[mellow flute instrumentals] -Finally, on Christmas Eve 1419,
Prince Claude of Aldovia and Prince Jun of Penglia,
translation.it: i principi Claude di Aldovia e Jun di Penglia,

translation.en: inspired by the season of peace and goodwill,
found a way to end the conflict.
translation.it: si accordarono per porre fine al conflitto.

translation.en: Just before midnight,
on that fateful Christmas Eve 1419,
translation.it: in quella fatidica vigilia di Natale del 1419,

translation.en: the truce was declared and the treaty signed.
translation.it: venne dichiarata la tregua e firmato il trattato.

translation.en: The treaty, your Majesties.
To honor the peace and friendship between our nations,
translation.it: Per onorare la pace e l'amicizia tra le nostre nazioni,

translation.en: the treaty has been ceremonially renewed
translation.it: il trattato è rinnovato con una cerimonia

translation.en: every 100 years since, without fail.
-[mellow flute instrumentals continue] -The artistry is incredible.
[Richard] It's a treasured artifact.
It's been under our protection since 1919.
translation.it: È sotto la nostra protezione dal 1919.

translation.en: And after the signing, it goes back to Penglia for the next hundred years.
translation.it: E dopo la firma, starà a Penglia per i prossimi cento anni.

translation.en: It's beautiful, with the signatures of every king.
translation.it: È bellissimo, con le firme di ogni re.

translation.en: [inhales] I'll be the first queen to sign it. You will, indeed.
translation.it: - Io sarò la prima regina a firmarlo. - Esatto.

translation.en: As long as the royals from Penglia agree.
translation.it: Se i reali di Penglia saranno d'accordo.

translation.en: [stammers] Whilst Aldovia boldly plunges into the 21st Century,
translation.it: Mentre Aldovia si lancia coraggiosamente nel 21° secolo,

translation.en: this treaty dates back to the 15th Century.
We'll have to proceed very carefully, Amber.
The Penglians are our closest allies but,
in many respects, they are quite traditional.
translation.it: ma per molti versi, sono piuttosto tradizionali.

translation.en: -[Amber chuckles] -An attitude personified
translation.it: ma per molti versi, sono piuttosto tradizionali. Atteggiamento impersonato dalla regina di Penglia, la regina Ming.

translation.en: by the Queen of Penglia, Queen Ming.
translation.it: Atteggiamento impersonato dalla regina di Penglia, la regina Ming.

translation.en: Compared to Queen Ming,
even Mrs. Averill comes off as rather carefree.
translation.it: anche la signora Averill è piuttosto spensierata.

translation.en: [Mrs. Averill] I have my carefree moments.
I had one last Sunday. [chuckles]
translation.it: Ne ho avuto uno domenica scorsa.

translation.en: I love a challenge. I can't wait to meet Queen Ming.
translation.it: Adoro le sfide. Non vedo l'ora di conoscere la regina Ming.

translation.en: They shall be here momentarily.
[Mrs. Averill] Now come on, everybody. Move into place, quickly.
translation.it: Forza, ragazzi. Mettetevi in posizione, presto.

translation.en: Once they exit, meet them in the center. King Richard will give a formal greeting.
translation.it: Quando escono, raggiungiamoli al centro. Re Richard porgerà un saluto formale.

translation.en: Welcome to Aldovia.
A most hearty welcome.
We're here to celebrate a hand clasp on a battlefield 600 years ago.
translation.it: Siamo qui per celebrare la stretta di mano su un campo di battaglia di 600 anni fa.

translation.en: That changed the fate of both our nations.
translation.it: Che ha cambiato il destino di entrambe le nostre nazioni.

translation.en: -[cameras shutter] -[chuckles] King Richard, so glad to finally meet you in person.
translation.it: Re Richard, felice di conoscerla di persona.

translation.en: Good to see you too, King Tai. May I introduce my wife, Queen Amber.
translation.it: È un piacere anche per me, re Tai. Vi presento mia moglie, la regina Amber.

translation.en: An honor. You're as lovely and charming as they say.
translation.it: Un onore. È adorabile e affascinante come dicono.

translation.en: My wife, Queen Ming of Penglia.
translation.it: Mia moglie, la regina Ming di Penglia.

translation.en: -Queen Ming. -I'm most pleased to be here.
translation.it: - Regina Ming. - Sono lieta di essere qui.

translation.en: And to finally lay eyes on the famous Queen Amber of New York.
translation.it: E di posare, finalmente, gli occhi sulla famosa regina Amber di New York.

translation.en: Wonderful to meet you, Queen Ming.
And you.
I'm Amber, hi.
Lynn is our attaché.
Fantastic!
Beautiful.
No one does Christmas like the Aldovians.
translation.it: Nessuno celebra il Natale come gli aldoviani.

translation.en: Thank you. We do our best.
If Emily had her way, we'd have a tree in every room.
translation.it: Se Emily potesse, avremmo un albero in ogni stanza.

translation.en: Actually, I believe you do.
Indeed, Tom.
-We have quite a bit of mistletoe too. -[Tom gulps]
[Simon, laughing] That's spectacular.
So, how do you two know each other? We studied together, Oxford.
translation.it: - Come vi siete conosciuti? - Studiavamo insieme, Oxford.

translation.en: I studied. Simon... caroused. I may have enjoyed the occasional night out,
translation.it: - Io studiavo. Simon... faceva baldoria. - Mi piaceva uscire ogni tanto la sera,

translation.en: but I'm not the one whose picture... -Hey, hey, hey! -...is hanging in the King's Arms Pub.
translation.it: ma non hanno una mia foto appesa al King's Arms Pub.

translation.en: [man] Red for you, your Highness. And sparkling water for you, Your Majesty.
translation.it: Per lei rosso, Vostra Altezza. E acqua frizzante per lei, Vostra Maestà.

translation.en: Thank you, Mr Zabala.
It appears you've adapted comfortably to your new role.
translation.it: Sembra si sia adattata bene al suo nuovo ruolo.

translation.en: I like to think so.
Not to say there haven't been growing pains.
translation.it: Ma non sono mancate le difficoltà.

translation.en: What with the Belgravians here, in Aldovia, as well,
translation.it: Con i belgraviani qui, anche ad Aldovia,

translation.en: it seems royals marrying outside of noble classes
translation.it: i matrimoni al di fuori delle classi nobili

translation.en: has become quite fashionable.
And now your first child -on the way. Congratulations. -[Amber chuckles]
translation.it: E ora il suo primo figlio in arrivo. Congratulazioni.

translation.en: Providing your kingdom with an heir is historically a Queen's utmost duty.
translation.it: Dare un erede al regno è storicamente il massimo dovere della regina.

translation.en: [stammers] Oh, I don't see it as a duty at all.
translation.it: Non credo che sia un dovere.

translation.en: Richard and I are simply excited to start our family.
translation.it: Io e Richard non vediamo l'ora di creare la nostra famiglia.

translation.en: You have three children of your own?
Yes. Harry is 13. Vivian and Amanda are ten.
translation.it: Sì. Harry ha 13 anni. Vivian e Amanda hanno dieci anni.

translation.en: Twins? I can't even imagine. [laughs]
I have to admit, I was excited to finally meet the playboy prince.
translation.it: Devo ammettere che non vedevo l'ora di conoscere il principe playboy.

translation.en: -[Richard chuckles] -I enjoyed living vicariously through your exploits in the press.
translation.it: Mi divertivo a vivere le sue imprese indirettamente tramite la stampa.

translation.en: It's all greatly exaggerated.
I was actually hoping to talk some business with you.
translation.it: Speravo di parlare di affari con lei.

translation.en: Business? Quite honestly,
I prefer to leave that tedium to Lynn.
translation.it: preferisco lasciare il tedio a Lynn.

translation.en: Congratulations on your new position, very impressive.
It's a start, but I soon hope to be accomplishing more.
translation.it: È un inizio, spero presto di ottenere di più.

translation.en: Ambitious as ever. [playfully scoffs]
What's your role at the palace?
translation.it: Qual è il tuo ruolo a palazzo?

translation.en: Cousin to the King, but you know me, working the angles.
translation.it: Cugino del re, ma mi conosci, sfrutto ogni occasione.

translation.en: -Oh, you always do. [laughs] -[Simon laughs]
[scoffs] Pardon me, got to take this. Angles of my own.
translation.it: Scusate, devo rispondere. Anche io ho occasioni.

translation.en: [inhales] She's a live wire.
Enjoying yourself?
-[stammers] Of course, yeah. -[Richard exhales in relief]
Are you familiar with Aldovia's modernization efforts?
translation.it: Conoscete gli sforzi di ammodernamento di Aldovia?

translation.en: I'm familiar with all aspects of Aldovia's policy.
translation.it: Conosco tutti gli aspetti della politica di Aldovia.

translation.en: Given its success, I spoke with Richard and
translation.it: Visto il suo successo, ho parlato con Richard,

translation.en: we feel that you and I should add our signatures to the treaty.
translation.it: pensiamo che lei ed io dovremmo aggiungere le nostre firme al trattato.

translation.en: You wish to modernize our 600 year old tradition?
translation.it: Vuole modernizzare la nostra tradizione di 600 anni?

translation.en: We, the Queens, could bring the tradition up to date.
translation.it: Noi, le regine, potremmo aggiornare la tradizione.

translation.en: History isn't made by those who follow rules.
translation.it: La storia non è fatta da chi segue le regole.

translation.en: [Mr. Little] Your Majesties.
May I announce the arrival of the CEO
and the Chief Designer from S & A Events International.
translation.it: e del Chief Designer dell'S&A Events International.

translation.en: -Your Majesties. -It's a pleasure to be here.
translation.it: - Vostre Maestà. - È un piacere essere qui.

translation.en: Andy, hi!
[Andy] Wow, look at you.
You've never looked more beautiful.
translation.it: Non sei mai stata così bella.

translation.en: So this is what you've been doing? Your secret project?
translation.it: Quindi fai questo? È il tuo progetto segreto?

translation.en: Consider Andrew and myself early Christmas gifts.
translation.it: Considera me e Andrew i primi regali di Natale.

translation.en: Weddings were too small a niche for such a big talent.
translation.it: I matrimoni erano una nicchia ristretta per il suo talento.

translation.en: We rebranded and expanded Sahil's business.
translation.it: Abbiamo rinnovato ed espanso l'attività di Sahil.

translation.en: I was happy to give Andrew the opportunity.
translation.it: Ero felice di dare a Andrew questa opportunità.

translation.en: Design genius meets management expertise.
translation.it: Il genio del design incontra l'esperienza manageriale.

translation.en: Mrs. Averill engaged us to make sure that you had
translation.it: La signora Averill ci ha assunti per darti

translation.en: the most spectacular royal baby shower of all time.
translation.it: il più bel baby shower reale di tutti i tempi.

translation.en: -You deserve it. -Thanks.
May I also offer our service, free of charge,
translation.it: Posso offrire il nostro servizio, gratuitamente,

translation.en: to the elevation of tomorrow's treaty signing?
Elevation?
I have seen the artifact. It's a bit tacky, no? [laughs]
translation.it: Ho visto il manufatto. È un po' pacchiano, no?

translation.en: It's a priceless work of art.
We will be standing by if you need us.
Great.
[Amber] Next question.
During labor I would like to spend the first stage
translation.it: Durante il travaglio, vorrei passare la prima fase

translation.en: lying down, standing up, walking around, in the shower or in the tub?
translation.it: sdraiata, in piedi, camminando, nella doccia o nella vasca?

translation.en: Lying down.
Walking around. New York, born and raised.
translation.it: Camminando. Nata e cresciuta a New York.

translation.en: Never realized labour came in multiple choice.
translation.it: Non sapevo che il travaglio fosse a scelta multipla.

translation.en: Testing. Testing. Can you hear me?
I can hear you.
Let's test it for real.
Extraordinary.
-Are you seeing this? -Yeah.
-[Amber sighs in frustration] -Can you still see me?
-[Amber chuckles] -Amber, hello?
This is unbelievable.
You're right. This is amazing.
Should we try from the nursery?
Now transmitting from the nursery.
-Can you hear me? -[Amber playful groans over monitor]
-Amber, hello? Are you there? -[whimpering over monitor]
I need a little help. -Is that crying? Amber? -[whimpering continues]
translation.it: - Mi serve un piccolo aiuto. - Sta piangendo? Amber?

translation.en: -[exhales] -What is it?
I can't even reach my own slippers.
translation.it: Non riesco nemmeno a mettere le pantofole.

translation.en: Allow me.
Perfect fit.
Cinderella was a bit more graceful.
But nowhere near as beautiful.
[Queen Ming] This storm could spell disaster.
translation.it: Questa tempesta potrebbe essere un disastro.

translation.en: Where's Lynn? I asked for an update four minutes ago.
translation.it: Dov'è Lynn? Ho chiesto un aggiornamento quattro minuti fa.

translation.en: Apologies, Queen Ming. I was speaking to the pilot.
translation.it: Chiedo scusa, regina Ming. Parlavo col pilota.

translation.en: And?
The storm brought the country to a standstill. All flights have been canceled.
translation.it: La tempesta ha fermato tutto il Paese. Tutti i voli sono stati cancellati.

translation.en: How would this affect the treaty signing?
translation.it: Che conseguenze ci sono sul trattato?

translation.en: The Aldovians wish to proceed the ceremony as scheduled.
translation.it: Gli aldoviani vogliono procedere come previsto.

translation.en: I agree.
Very well.
Find us a way home directly afterwards.
translation.it: Trova un modo per tornare a casa subito dopo.

translation.en: Our children expect us back.
Yes.
[Queen Helena] Such a shame there are so few guests to witness this beautiful event.
translation.it: Peccato che ci siano così pochi ospiti a questo bellissimo evento.

translation.en: Yes, I'm afraid no one's been able to travel anywhere today, Your Majesty.
translation.it: Sì, temo che nessuno sia riuscito a viaggiare, Maestà.

translation.en: Your Majesties.
As expected, the Penglians have officially rejected
translation.it: Come previsto, i pengliani hanno ufficialmente rifiutato

translation.en: -either queen signing the treaty. -[Richard inhales deeply]
translation.it: che le regine firmino il trattato.

translation.en: [exhales slowly] I'm sorry.
In a few minutes, this will all be over
and then we can focus on what's most important.
translation.it: e ci concentreremo sulle cose importanti.

translation.en: You and the baby.
There's a little too much red.
I think they can do with a little bit more blue, -to be honest. -Yeah.
translation.it: Onestamente, potrebbero aggiungere un po' di blu.

translation.en: [Sahil] I'm thinking royal blue.
Mm... Yeah. Could work.
In honor of the sacred treaty,
signed on the battlefield on Christmas Eve in the year 1419,
translation.it: firmato sul campo di battaglia la vigilia di Natale dell'anno 1419,

translation.en: the monarchy of Aldovia
welcomes King Tai and Queen Ming of Penglia.
translation.it: accoglie il re Tai e la regina Ming di Penglia.

translation.en: No. No, no, no.
It is my great honor and privilege
translation.it: È mio grande onore e privilegio

translation.en: to preside over the seventh signing of the sacred truce between our realms.
translation.it: presiedere la settima firma della tregua sacra tra i nostri regni.

translation.en: The entire Kingdom of Aldovia
heartily embraces our alliance with Penglia.
translation.it: accoglie con entusiasmo la nostra alleanza con Penglia.

translation.en: What began as a handshake on Christmas Eve
translation.it: Ciò che è iniziato con una stretta di mano la vigilia di Natale

translation.en: has evolved into an ever-growing bond
translation.it: si è evoluto in un legame in continua crescita

translation.en: represented by our invaluable, ever-expanding
translation.it: rappresentato dal nostro inestimabile e in continua espansione

translation.en: precious treaty.
Mr. Little, let the signing begin.
translation.it: Signor Little, che la cerimonia abbia inizio.

translation.en: How is this possible?
Where's the treaty? It's supposed to be there.
translation.it: Dov'è il trattato? Dovrebbe essere lì.

translation.en: We do apologize.
I'm sure we can get this little mix-up straightened out right away.
translation.it: Sono sicura che sistemeremo subito questo malinteso.

translation.en: Well this is certainly embarrassing.
If we don't sort this out, we'll all end up in the dungeon.
translation.it: Se non risolviamo la cosa, finiremo tutti nelle segrete.

translation.en: Indeed.
Perhaps now it can be replaced with something more palatable.
translation.it: Forse ora può essere sostituito con qualcosa di più appetibile.

translation.en: There must be an explanation. Does anyone have any idea what's going on?
translation.it: - Dev'esserci una spiegazione. - Qualcuno sa cosa succede?

translation.en: The treaty was there last night when we checked.
translation.it: Era lì ieri, quando abbiamo controllato.

translation.en: -I can confirm. -And now it's vanished.
I've been saying that we should update the security protocols ever since...
translation.it: Dico di aggiornare i protocolli di sicurezza da quando...

translation.en: well, you infiltrated the palace.
But no one has come or gone since the blizzard.
translation.it: Nessuno è entrato o uscito, vista la tormenta.

translation.en: So the treaty must still be in the palace. Along with whoever took it.
translation.it: - Il trattato è ancora a palazzo. - Assieme a chi l'ha preso.

translation.en: -[hushed] What do we do now? -[hushed] I don't know--
[Richard] Simon.
[sighs] We need your help.
You're kidding.
Well, I'd be delighted. What can I do for my king and queen?
translation.it: Con piacere. Cosa posso fare per il mio re e la mia regina?

translation.en: Find a way to occupy our guests while we locate the treaty.
translation.it: Tieni gli ospiti occupati mentre cerchiamo il trattato.

translation.en: [hushed] It's okay, we'll make sure-- I'll make sure everything's sorted.
translation.it: Tranquilli, faremo... Farò in modo che si risolva tutto.

translation.en: And how am I to do that?
You're friends with Lynn. Keep them entertained.
Lynn's easy to entertain.
Not so sure about the others.
[hushed] One thing is for certain.
Just stick with Simon and make sure he doesn't do anything Simon-like.
translation.it: Stai con Simon e assicurati che non faccia niente da Simon.

translation.en: I'll be your eyes and ears.
translation.it: Sarò i tuoi occhi e le tue orecchie.

translation.en: I know what might be a bit of fun.
Is this some kind of game?
Top of the tree, a classic Aldovian Christmas game.
translation.it: In cima all'albero, un classico gioco di Natale aldoviano.

translation.en: Wow, I haven't played this since I was a kid. [chuckles]
translation.it: Non ci gioco da quando ero bambino.

translation.en: Shockingly good idea, Simon.
Two teams compete, the goal being to decorate your side of the tree first.
translation.it: È un gioco a squadre, vince chi decora per primo il proprio lato dell'albero.

translation.en: The team that places the star on top of the tree wins.
translation.it: La squadra che mette la stella in cima all'albero vince.

translation.en: You want us to play a children's game in the midst of this scandal?
translation.it: Vuoi che facciamo un gioco per bambini durante uno scandalo?

translation.en: Well, it's an unfortunate delay, it's not really a scandal, yet.
translation.it: È uno spiacevole ritardo, non proprio uno scandalo.

translation.en: Simon has a great talent for games.
translation.it: Simon ha un grande talento per i giochi.

translation.en: -He's definitely talented at many things. -[Simon laughs uneasily]
translation.it: Ha molto talento in molte cose.

translation.en: Ornaments are awarded for answering questions
translation.it: Le decorazioni si guadagnano rispondendo a domande

translation.en: about famous royal traditions and legends.
translation.it: su famose tradizioni e leggende reali.

translation.en: Count me in.
Our children would enjoy this.
I'll go and inform them about the delay.
Of course.
It's a pity though, we should have even teams.
Well, I'm happy to sit out if it helps.
translation.it: Io ne resto fuori, se serve.

translation.en: I'm not exactly a whiz at royal traditions yet.
translation.it: Non sono ancora una maga delle tradizioni reali.

translation.en: I'll join King Tai. I embrace any opportunity to beat Simon.
translation.it: Mi unirò al re Tai. Ogni opportunità è buona per battere Simon.

translation.en: -I like your spirit, Princess. -[chair creaks]
Well, guess that makes it... [exhales]
you and me. [chuckles]
-Would you like to start? -Yes, please.
Any luck?
Not yet. [sighs]
We know the treaty was here last night.
translation.it: Sappiamo che il trattato c'era, ieri.

translation.en: We know that nobody's entered or left the palace. Are you proposing we make a list of suspects?
translation.it: - E nessuno è entrato o uscito da palazzo. - Vuoi fare una lista dei sospettati?

translation.en: Investigative journalism 101.
The treaty didn't fly away on its own.
translation.it: Il trattato non può essere sparito da solo.

translation.en: Did you notice the look that Simon and Lynn exchanged when the treaty went missing?
translation.it: Hai notato lo sguardo tra Simon e Lynn quando il trattato è scomparso?

translation.en: And Sahil called it tacky. I wouldn't put it past him.
translation.it: E Sahil l'ha definito pacchiano. Non mi sorprenderebbe.

translation.en: Who in this palace had the means, the opportunity, the motive?
translation.it: Chi, a palazzo, aveva mezzi, opportunità e movente?

translation.en: -Did you take it? -No.
Neither did I. That's two down.
Very funny.
[scoffs] This is an easy one.
In the legend "Princess Froon," Grendel's pet is what animal?
translation.it: Nella leggenda "Principessa Froon", qual è l'animale domestico di Grendel?

translation.en: [scoffs] Even I know this one, from your Christmas pageant.
translation.it: Lo so pure io, per la tua recita di Natale.

translation.en: -Don't you dare say. -Turtle!
-Yes, well played. One more and we win. -[Lynn squeals in delight]
translation.it: Già, ben fatto. Ancora uno e vinciamo.

translation.en: Tweet, tweet, tweet.
-That is beautiful. -[Lynn laughs] Do you see that, Melissa, what she made? It's amazing.
translation.it: È bellissimo. Hai visto cos'ha fatto, Melissa? È incredibile.

translation.en: I can make you one.
Actually, I need to get some air.
translation.it: In realtà, vado a prendere un po' d'aria.

translation.en: Melissa! Melissa...
Wait!
We should probably check on Ming.
A pity, Princess Emily, we would have won.
translation.it: Peccato, principessa Emily, avremmo potuto vincere.

translation.en: Sorry.
This game was a favorite in my family, too.
translation.it: Anche nella mia famiglia giocavamo spesso così.

translation.en: Final question.
Who was Aldovia's greatest king and father?
translation.it: Chi era il più grande re e padre di Aldovia?

translation.en: That isn't a real question.
But you know the answer.
My father.
The star.
You win.
Will you do the honors?
As you wish.
-[indistinct conversation] -Hey!
Where are you going?
Simon and I need some alone time.
translation.it: Io e Simon abbiamo bisogno di stare da soli.

translation.en: Melissa suggested a walk in the snow.
translation.it: Melissa ha suggerito una passeggiata sulla neve.

translation.en: What about the Penglians?
Well Emily's more than capable and my priority is Melissa.
translation.it: Emily è più che capace e la mia priorità è Melissa.

translation.en: Mel, can we talk a sec?
Yeah, sure.
I'll see about clearing a path.
-[kissing sound] -My hero!
What's up?
Well, you and Simon, for one thing. I never realized you were so close.
translation.it: Beh, tu e Simon, tanto per iniziare. Non avevo capito foste così vicini.

translation.en: We talk for hours every night.
He's really smart,
funny, super cute and really misunderstood.
translation.it: divertente, super carino e molto incompreso.

translation.en: Misunderstood?
Mel, all your bad boys have left you heartbroken.
translation.it: Mel, tutti i cattivi ragazzi ti hanno spezzato il cuore.

translation.en: He's more than just a bad boy.
translation.it: È più di un cattivo ragazzo.

translation.en: He cares about me.
It's starting to feel real, you know?
We are just worried about his intentions.
translation.it: Siamo solo preoccupati per le sue intenzioni.

translation.en: Have you seen the way he looks at Lynn?
He swears Lynn is just a friend.
translation.it: Giura che Lynn è solo un'amica.

translation.en: I don't know, sometimes I get a little insecure, out of my depth with royals, you get that.
translation.it: Non so, a volte mi sento un po' insicura, fuori posto con i reali, mi capisci.

translation.en: Yeah, but you don't know Simon like we do. And you don't know Simon like I do.
translation.it: - Non lo conosci quanto noi. - E non lo conoscete come me.

translation.en: I appreciate you looking out for me, -but Simon and I... -[dramatic instrumentals]
translation.it: Apprezzo che ti preoccupi per me, ma io e Simon...

translation.en: we're in love.
Not just like a lot or heavily infatuated?
translation.it: Non è che ti piace molto o che sei infatuata?

translation.en: I want it to work.
[clicks tongue] I hear you.
Has the treaty been found? It pains me to say no, Your Majesty.
translation.it: - Il trattato è stato trovato? - Mi addolora dire di no, Vostra Maestà.

translation.en: After our initial survey,
we can assume it's nowhere obvious.
translation.it: supponiamo che non sia in un luogo scontato.

translation.en: Your Majesty, please, be assured
translation.it: Vostra Maestà, la prego, stia certa

translation.en: no one will rest until it's located.
translation.it: che nessuno si fermerà finché non sarà trovato.

translation.en: Thank you.
Because, according to the treaty's terms,
translation.it: Perché, secondo i termini del trattato,

translation.en: if it's not renewed by midnight on Christmas Eve,
translation.it: se non verrà rinnovato entro mezzanotte della vigilia di Natale,

translation.en: Aldovia and Penglia technically return to a state of war.
translation.it: Aldovia e Penglia torneranno in stato di guerra.

translation.en: Should be interesting, as neither country has a standing army.
translation.it: Interessante, nessuno dei due Paesi ha un esercito permanente.

translation.en: Emily, I thought you were with our guests.
translation.it: Emily, pensavo fossi con gli ospiti.

translation.en: Simon had to end the game abruptly. They've returned to their rooms.
translation.it: Simon ha dovuto interrompere il gioco. Sono nelle loro stanze.

translation.en: This situation is just so inelegant.
translation.it: Questa situazione è così poco elegante.

translation.en: Please, continue to search.
Your Majesty.
Is this about the treaty?
Mother, did you read this?
"If there comes a day the sacred truce is broken,
translation.it: "Se un giorno, la tregua sarà spezzata,

translation.en: the Kingdom disrupting the peace shall suffer a dreadful fate:
translation.it: il regno che distrugge la pace subirà un orribile destino:

translation.en: upon the firstborn a beshrew."
What's a beshrew?
[scoffs] It's a curse.
People believed in things like that back then.
translation.it: Ai tempi, si credeva in queste cose.

translation.en: How did it work?
A sorceress would conjure a spell
to ensure that the two kingdoms upheld the treaty.
translation.it: per assicurarsi che i due regni mantenessero il trattato.

translation.en: So, if we don't sign the treaty by Christmas Eve,
translation.it: Se non firmiamo il trattato entro la vigilia,

translation.en: there'll be a curse on the firstborn child?
translation.it: ci sarà una maledizione sul primogenito?

translation.en: That's Amber and Richard's baby.
translation.it: Il figlio di Amber e Richard.

translation.en: Sorcery fell out of favor centuries ago.
translation.it: La stregoneria è caduta in disgrazia secoli fa.

translation.en: Emily, we're not going to bother anyone with this nonsense.
translation.it: Emily, non turbiamo nessuno con queste sciocchezze.

translation.en: But what if it isn't nonsense?
translation.it: E se non fosse una sciocchezza?

translation.en: [Richard] What is it?
Baby's kicking a lot.
Amazing.
Little striker in there.
More likely upset about my chat with Melissa.
translation.it: È irritato per la chiacchierata con Melissa.

translation.en: Does Simon have an alibi?
No idea, but she thinks he's a great guy, says they're in love.
translation.it: Non so, ma lei pensa che sia un bravo ragazzo, che siano innamorati.

translation.en: Love is blind.
Perhaps sleuthing while pregnant isn't the best idea.
translation.it: Investigare con la gravidanza non è una buona idea.

translation.en: I may be expecting and Queen, but I'm still a journalist.
translation.it: Sarò pure incinta e regina, ma sono ancora una giornalista.

translation.en: And right now, my investigation needs your help.
translation.it: E ora mi devi aiutare con l'indagine.

translation.en: Not now, Andrew. I'm in the zone, designing.
-Andrew! -[paper whooshes]
Andrew--
Your Majesty.
Please, come-- come in. Sorry to disturb you, Sahil.
translation.it: - Prego, si accomodi. - Scusa il disturbo, Sahil.

translation.en: I have a design question about the nursery. Do you have a moment?
translation.it: Ho una domanda sul design della cameretta. Hai un momento?

translation.en: Now? [stammers] Of course, Your Majesty. I appreciate this.
translation.it: - Ora? Certo, Vostra Maestà. - Lo apprezzo molto.

translation.en: It's about the best location for the crib, given the layout.
translation.it: È la posizione della culla, data la disposizione.

translation.en: Spatial flow is absolutely crucial.
I have studied the Aztecs, Mongols and Zulus to arrive at my own theories.
translation.it: Ho studiato gli Aztechi, i mongoli e gli Zulu per arrivare alle mie teorie.

translation.en: -I should get my tape measure. -No, no, no, no!
[stammering] I mean I have a royal tape measure waiting for us.
translation.it: Cioè, ho un metro reale che ci aspetta.

translation.en: I am envisioning monochrome with geometric prints.
translation.it: Sto immaginando monocromo con stampe geometriche.

translation.en: -Sahil? -[knocking]
Hi, Eddie. [stammers] Andrew.
-Amber. -[exhales] Is Sahil here?
-[stammering] No, I was just-- -Just...
[sighs] Helping with the search.
Sahil called the treaty tacky. I went too far. Don't be mad at me.
translation.it: Sahil ha definito il trattato pacchiano. Ho esagerato. Non arrabbiarti con me.

translation.en: [laughs] Mad?
Look, I work with the guy daily.
I get it. He's opinionated.
It was a lead. We follow leads, remember?
translation.it: Era una pista. Seguiamo le piste, ricordi?

translation.en: I do, it's just we have a multi-million dollar business now and Sahil would never risk it.
translation.it: Sì, ma abbiamo un'attività multimilionaria e Sahil non la metterebbe a rischio.

translation.en: Multi-million dollars, really?
Yeah. So if you wanna write a story, write about us.
translation.it: Se vuoi scrivere una storia, scrivi di noi.

translation.en: -Like a puff piece? -Exactly.
-After the baby, of course. -Of course.
[exhales] Tell me you had success.
Thanks to your little ruse, the last hour's felt like a month.
translation.it: Grazie a te, l'ultima ora è sembrata un mese.

translation.en: -Once Sahil gets in the zone-- -He didn't take it.
translation.it: - Se Zahil si fa prendere... - Non l'ha preso lui.

translation.en: You're right,
I don't need to focus on this missing treaty.
translation.it: non devo concentrarmi sul trattato scomparso.

translation.en: [Richard] No, you absolutely don't.
Actually, you do.
I'm not meant to tell you this because it's probably rubbish.
translation.it: Non dovrei dirvelo perché sarà una cavolata.

translation.en: But...
a curse will befall the King and Queen responsible for breaking the treaty.
translation.it: Una maledizione cadrà su re e regina che violeranno il trattato.

translation.en: Seriously? A curse?
Concocted by a sorceress to ensure the treaty wasn't broken.
translation.it: Fu lanciata da una strega per non farlo infrangere.

translation.en: Sorcery. Hardly a cause for concern.
If the treaty isn't signed in time, by midnight Christmas Eve,
translation.it: Se non si firma il trattato entro mezzanotte della vigilia,

translation.en: it takes effect. Why are you putting stock in this nonsense?
translation.it: - avrà effetto. - Perché credi a queste sciocchezze?

translation.en: It's a curse on your firstborn.
On this baby?
Our baby.
According to the history book.
The chance of this being real is infinitesimal.
translation.it: La possibilità che sia vero è infinitesimale.

translation.en: I don't care if it's one in a billion, I'm not risking it.
translation.it: Non m'importa se è una su un miliardo, io non rischio.

translation.en: We need to find this treaty.
[woman over PA] Attention, flight 1225 -[planes flying overhead] -to Aldovia is still canceled.
translation.it: Attenzione, il volo 1225 per Aldovia è ancora annullato.

translation.en: Eh, no clue when they'll start letting flights in,
translation.it: Non so quando inizieranno a farci partire,

translation.en: but I'll be on the first one as soon as they do.
translation.it: ma salirò sul primo aereo disponibile.

translation.en: How about you guys, how you doing?
Honestly, disaster on all fronts. Melissa is in love with Simon.
translation.it: Disastro su tutti i fronti. Melissa è innamorata di Simon.

translation.en: We have to cancel tomorrow's baby shower, the treaty is missing
translation.it: Dobbiamo annullare il baby shower, il trattato è sparito

translation.en: and if we don't find it by midnight on Christmas Eve,
translation.it: e se non lo troviamo entro la vigilia,

translation.en: our baby is cursed. Hold on, you're gonna have to explain that one.
translation.it: - nostro figlio sarà maledetto. - Un attimo, spiegatemi bene.

translation.en: -It's a long story. -Emphasis on story,
translation.it: - È una lunga storia. - Enfasi su storia,

translation.en: and we have until Christmas Eve to sort it out. -Tomorrow's only the 23rd. -[Rudy exhales steadily]
translation.it: e abbiamo fino alla vigilia per risolvere la cosa.Domani è il 23.

translation.en: Well, I don't know much about this supernatural stuff,
translation.it: Non ne so molto di cose sovrannaturali,

translation.en: but go easy on Melissa, huh?
translation.it: ma vacci piano con Melissa, eh?

translation.en: Love makes people do funny things.
You gave up New York slices and bagels for meat jelly.
translation.it: Tu hai rinunciato a pizza e bagel di New York per la gelatina di carne.

translation.en: Oh! Could you please bring me some bagels?
You got it.
Now, why'd you cancel your baby shower?
translation.it: Perché avete cancellato il baby shower?

translation.en: No one can get here. The storm.
There's plenty of people in the palace. Have it anyway.
translation.it: C'è tanta gente a palazzo. Fatelo lo stesso.

translation.en: It just doesn't feel like the right time.
From what you're saying, sounds like a little hope and joy is just what the palace needs.
translation.it: Da quello che dici, quel posto ha bisogno di speranza e gioia.

translation.en: Have the shower.
[Emily, echoing] A curse upon the firstborn,
upon the firstborn...
[hushed] Richard.
[Amber] The Royal Scandal of the Fathers of the Silk Road Treaty.
translation.it: Lo scandalo reale dei padri del trattato della Via della Seta.

translation.en: Royal scandal?
Did you know there was a love triangle
translation.it: Sapevi che c'era un triangolo amoroso

translation.en: between Prince Claude and Prince Jun over Claude's newlywed, Princess Jocelyn?
translation.it: tra i principi Claude e Jun e la sposa di Claude, la principessa Jocelyn?

translation.en: I believe they taught us that at boarding school.
translation.it: Credo ce l'abbiano detto a scuola.

translation.en: Oh my gosh!
Soon after the royal treaty was signed,
translation.it: Poco dopo la firma del trattato,

translation.en: Prince Claude was poisoned. Many believed Prince Jun did it.
translation.it: il principe Claude fu avvelenato. Molti credevano fosse stato Jun.

translation.en: The house of Devon, Claude's family, fell out of power
translation.it: La casata dei Devon, la famiglia di Claude, perse i poteri

translation.en: and Claude's descendants swore vengeance.
translation.it: e i discendenti di Claude giurarono vendetta.

translation.en: Why does that name sound familiar?
You're up early, my dear.
Oh, I couldn't sleep.
Baby had a restless night.
translation.it: Il bambino si è agitato tutta la notte.

translation.en: One day, you'll look back on all the sleepless nights
translation.it: Un giorno, ripenserai a tutte le notti insonni

translation.en: and you'll realize -they're amongst your sweetest memories. -[Amber chuckles]
translation.it: e capirai che sono tra i tuoi più dolci ricordi.

translation.en: It's a big change, isn't it?
It's the greatest adventure, but your life will never be the same again.
translation.it: È la più grande avventura, ma la tua vita non sarà più la stessa.

translation.en: There are so many things that I wish I could ask my mom.
translation.it: Ci sono tante cose che vorrei poter chiedere a mia madre.

translation.en: Amber, never forget that she's right here.
translation.it: Amber, non dimenticare che è qui.

translation.en: Her spirit's in you and your baby.
translation.it: Il suo spirito è dentro di te e nel tuo bambino.

translation.en: She gave you good instincts
translation.it: Ti ha dato un buon istinto

translation.en: and, through your baby, she'll guide you,
translation.it: e ti guiderà tramite tuo figlio,

translation.en: always.
I'm so grateful I have you. I'm here.
translation.it: - Sono molto grata di averti qui. - Sono qui.

translation.en: For anything.
When you were expecting Emily, did you try hypnobirthing?
translation.it: Quando aspettavi Emily, hai provato l'ipnoparto?

translation.en: Hypnobirthing?
What on earth is hypnobirthing?
[Dr. Magoro through laptop] Fear causes the body to tense up

translation.en: -How far apart are the contractions? -Close. Getting stronger.
translation.it: - Quanto passa tra le contrazioni? - Poco. Sono sempre più forti.

translation.en: We call them surges as per the doctor -who's on her way. -[phone ringing]
translation.it: "Sovratensioni". La dottoressa che sta arrivando le chiama così.

translation.en: This is her.
[Dr. Magoro] King Richard...
I found myself in a bit of a situation.
translation.it: Mi ritrovo in una situazione difficile.

translation.en: [exhales] Where are you?
North road. Stay in your car.
What is it? She's stuck in a snow bank.
translation.it: - Che c'è? - È bloccata nella neve.

translation.en: But the baby's coming.
I used to volunteer at a maternity ward. I will help you through this.
translation.it: Facevo volontariato in maternità. La aiuterò io.

translation.en: Tai, cancel our flight.
Of course. Lynn!
Thank you, Queen Ming.
-I'll get Dr. Magoro. -[exhales] Richard!
I'll be back with her as soon as I can.
translation.it: Torno con lei al più presto.

translation.en: You can do this, birth plan or not. I love you.
translation.it: - Puoi farcela, piano di nascita o no. - Ti amo.

translation.en: -I love you. -[kissing sound]
-[Amber inhales] -Take care of her, please.
translation.it: Prendetevi cura di lei, vi prego.

translation.en: Richard, we heard about Amber. Is there--
-[gruff] I'll deal with you later. -[Simon] Wh--
translation.it: - A te ci penso dopo. - Cosa...

translation.en: -Good boy, let's go. -[thudding]
I too had the baby come early.
translation.it: Anch'io ho avuto un parto prematuro.

translation.en: -You did? -My son.
He's okay?
He's intelligent, capable
-and has the energy of three boys. -[Amber sighs]
translation.it: e ha l'energia di tre ragazzi.

translation.en: Your baby will be perfectly fine.
Your child is strong, Amber. Like you and Richard.
translation.it: Tuo figlio è forte, Amber. Come te e Richard.

translation.en: But I can't help but worry that it's going to be midnight soon.
translation.it: Ma non posso non temere che presto sarà mezzanotte.

translation.en: If that treaty isn't signed, my baby is cursed.
translation.it: Se quel trattato non verrà firmato, mio figlio sarà maledetto.

translation.en: I told you not to worry Amber with that nonsense.
translation.it: Avevo detto di non far preoccupare Amber con queste sciocchezze.

translation.en: But what if it's true?
Sorcery was discredited a long time ago, for good reason.
translation.it: La stregoneria è stata screditata tanto tempo fa, per una buona ragione.

translation.en: Many old treaties involved punitive superstitions.
translation.it: Molti vecchi trattati invocano superstizioni punitive.

translation.en: -It's not unusual. -[Amber sighs]
Tell me about this one.
Well, what I read was about a sorceress that cast a spell.
translation.it: Ho letto di una strega che ha fatto un incantesimo.

translation.en: Not tonight.
-Come on! -[horse brays]
The curse affects the firstborn child of whichever kingdom causes the truce to break.
translation.it: La maledizione cade sul primogenito del regno che interrompe la tregua.

translation.en: Typical for its time, but that time is not our time.
translation.it: Tipico del tempo, ma non è il nostro.

translation.en: Still...
You don't want to risk it, I understand,
as small a chance as it may be.
translation.it: per quanto sia una piccola possibilità.

translation.en: A mother's love for her child is greater than anything.
translation.it: L'amore di una madre per un figlio supera ogni cosa.

translation.en: Someone in this palace sabotaged the signing of the treaty. Why?
translation.it: Qualcuno in questo palazzo ha sabotato la firma del trattato. Perché?

translation.en: [exhales] Your Majesty! I've spoken to the doctor
translation.it: Vostra Maestà! Ho parlato con la dottoressa

translation.en: and she said it's acceptable to administer pain medication for your...
translation.it: e ha detto che è accettabile somministrare antidolorifici per le sue...

translation.en: surges.
Thank you, Mrs. Averill, but I need to keep my mind sharp.
translation.it: Grazie, ma devo tenere la mente lucida.

translation.en: We all want what's best for your baby and for you.
translation.it: Vogliamo il meglio per il tuo bambino e per te.

translation.en: Please try not to worry needlessly.
Maybe it isn't needless. It could be real. After all, our dungeon is haunted.
translation.it: Forse non è inutile. Potrebbe essere vero. Dopotutto, la nostra prigione è infestata.

translation.en: -Haunted? -Yes.
Mr. Little even encountered it, the ghost of the thief who stole the treaty 200 years ago.
translation.it: Il signor Little ha incontrato il fantasma del ladro che aveva rubato il trattato.

translation.en: [breathless] Emily, listen to me.
I need you to do something for me right now. [sharp exhale]
translation.it: Ho bisogno che tu faccia una cosa per me.

translation.en: Why on earth did Amber want us to come down here?
translation.it: Perché Amber voleva che venissimo qui?

translation.en: She insists we search the furthest corner.
[Emily] Pray we avoid the ghost that haunts this dungeon.
translation.it: Speriamo di evitare il fantasma che infesta la prigione.

translation.en: You're not scared of the made-up ghost, are you?
translation.it: Non hai paura dei fantasmi finti, vero?

translation.en: What was that?
Just-- Just our imaginations.
Working in unison.
Come along.
[Emily] Leopold was here.
Now we are.
-[keys jingling] -[Emily] Oh, no!
[yelling] Help!
Oh, dear.
[Emily, yelling] Help! Help us!
Help!
Please help!
Dr. Magoro?
-Are you all right? -I am now, thank you.
I trust you know how to ride. [exhales]
-I do, indeed. -[door clicks open]
-Poor thing. -[continued groaning]
This is not the time, Simon.
You look like you could use these.
Squeeze these when you're feeling overwhelmed.
Works for me.
Thank you, Simon.
The hot water you requested, Your Majesty.
translation.it: L'acqua calda che ha richiesto, Vostra Maestà.

translation.en: I need a heating pad and a paint roller with a good handle.
translation.it: Voglio una borsa dell'acqua calda e un rullo con un buon manico.

translation.en: Of course, straight away.
I have a heating pad and good luck with the roller.
translation.it: Ho un cuscino termico e buona fortuna col rullo.

translation.en: Is there anything we can do to help?
I am charged with finding a paint roller in a palace.
translation.it: Devo trovare un rullo da pittura in un palazzo.

translation.en: -I possess such an item. -[playful instrumentals]
translation.it: Io possiedo un oggetto del genere.

translation.en: -Really? -You do?
With a good handle?
A very excellent handle, yes.
And may I ask why?
No, you may not, Andrew.
Come, Mr. Z.
-We will get it. -Thank you.
[Emily, yelling] Help! Please help us!
Help!
It's no use, darling, no one can hear us.
translation.it: È inutile, tesoro, nessuno ci sente.

translation.en: Look, a key!
-[sighs] It's too far. -[strained exhale]
[breathless] That's really helping.
How long did you volunteer at the hospital?
-Many years. -You certainly learned a lot.
I learned no job is more demanding or rewarding than motherhood.
translation.it: Come che nessun lavoro è più impegnativo o gratificante della maternità.

translation.en: Penglia now has services in place
to assist and support all of our mothers in any way they might need.
translation.it: per aiutare e sostenere tutte le madri in qualsiasi modo.

translation.en: [exhales] I heard about that program, it's fantastic.
translation.it: Ho sentito del programma, è fantastico.

translation.en: I'm trying to implement something similar here, with a few updates.
translation.it: Vorrei realizzare una cosa simile qui, con qualche aggiornamento.

translation.en: -You're so close. -[grunts]
That's it, almost. You have it, you've got it.
-You got it! -[strains]
There you are. Good girl.
Almost there.
Lift it up.
-Emily! -[thud]
Emily, are you all right?
-Yes, I'm fine. -The stone didn't hurt you?
translation.it: - Sì, sto bene. - Ti sei ferita con la roccia?

translation.en: Look, in there.
-I can't believe it. -The missing treaty.
translation.it: - Non posso crederci. - Il trattato scomparso.

translation.en: What was that?
The ghost, coming to get the treaty.
translation.it: Il fantasma viene a prendere il trattato.

translation.en: -[pants] -No, listen.
translation.it: Il fantasma viene a prendere il trattato. No, ascolta.

translation.en: It's the wind blowing through the stones.
translation.it: È il vento che soffia tra le pietre.

translation.en: -[stammers] So, no ghost? -[exhales]
But we have the treaty.
But we're still locked in.
-[Richard] Amber. -[Amber] Richard.
-[Richard pants] How are you? -No baby yet.
Everything's going to be fine, Your Majesty.
How far apart are the surges? Five minutes, progressing steadily.
translation.it: - Quanto sono distanti le sovratensioni? - Cinque minuti, in aumento.

translation.en: Ah. Thank you for being so attentive.
It's useless.
It's nearly midnight.
It's over.
We mustn't give up.
But what can we do?
This.
[chuckles] Brilliant, Mother.
The linens, doctor.
[Amber] What time is it?
Ten minutes to midnight.
[breathless] Where are they?
The treaty, we found the treaty. What? Where?
translation.it: - Il trattato, l'abbiamo trovato. - Cosa? Dove?

translation.en: In the dungeon.
How did you know? Amber solved the mystery.
translation.it: - Come lo sapevate? - Amber ha risolto il mistero.

translation.en: I did.
Come in, everyone. You all need to hear this.
Someone right here, in this very room, stole the treaty.
translation.it: Qualcuno, proprio qui, ha rubato il trattato.

translation.en: [Richard] Tell us everything you know.
The scandal that followed the signing of the treaty
translation.it: Lo scandalo che seguì la firma del trattato

translation.en: resulted in the alleged poisoning of Prince Claude.
translation.it: portò al presunto avvelenamento del principe Claude.

translation.en: His family swore vengeance
and a member of that family is in this room.
translation.it: e un membro di quella famiglia è in questa stanza.

translation.en: [Richard] Go on.
Prince Claude's family name, Devon, was familiar to me
translation.it: Il nome di famiglia del principe Claude, Devon, mi era familiare

translation.en: and tonight I remembered why.
translation.it: e stasera ho ricordato il perché.

translation.en: I read it in this book.
Your mother's maiden name was Devin.
translation.it: Il cognome da nubile di sua madre era Devon...

translation.en: Wasn't it, Mr. Little?
I know it was you, Mr. Little.
translation.it: So che è stato lei, signor Little.

translation.en: You were the last one to lock up the treaty, you kept the dog out of the dungeon
translation.it: È stato l'ultimo a posare il trattato, ha tenuto il cane fuori dalle segrete

translation.en: and you tried to keep Emily out of the dungeon
translation.it: e ha cercato di tenere Emily fuori dalle segrete

translation.en: with some made-up ghost story.
-[continued sighing] -If you're guilty, Mr. Little,
translation.it: Se è il colpevole, signor Little,

translation.en: confess here and now.
I did do it.
To break the truce
and sever our ties with Penglia.
translation.it: e tagliare i ponti con Penglia.

translation.en: But why?
I was bound by a solemn blood oath,
translation.it: Ero legato da un giuramento di sangue,

translation.en: a sworn duty to avenge the crime against my family
translation.it: un dovere giurato di vendicare il crimine contro la mia famiglia

translation.en: by the Penglian Prince Jun.
Mr. Little, Prince Jun's guilt was never proven.
translation.it: Signor Little, la colpevolezza del principe Jun non è mai stata provata.

translation.en: Our historians believe that the real culprit
translation.it: I nostri storici credono che il colpevole

translation.en: was a covetous feudal lord.
I had a duty. I fulfilled it.
You nearly started a war.
And could have cursed an innocent baby.
translation.it: E avrebbe fatto maledire un bambino innocente.

translation.en: I didn't know about the curse until tonight.
translation.it: Solo stasera ho saputo della maledizione.

translation.en: And I would never bring harm to your baby.
translation.it: E non farei mai del male al suo bambino.

translation.en: -[Queen Helena] Mr. Zabala. -Ma'am?
Take Mr. Little to the Leopold Suite. -[dark instrumentals] -At once.
I apologize for my behavior earlier.
Did you think...
We had our suspicions.
Not you, too!
Lynn and I have been working diligently
translation.it: Io e Lynn abbiamo lavorato con diligenza

translation.en: on economic amendments to the treaty which should benefit both kingdoms.
translation.it: agli emendamenti economici al trattato che gioveranno ai due regni.

translation.en: And we've found a very promising solution.
That's all it was, I promise.
What is it?
When I came to your room last night after Lynn left, you hid something.
translation.it: Sono entrata in camera tua dopo che Lynn è uscita e hai nascosto qualcosa.

translation.en: [stammers] How can that relate to the treaty?
translation.it: Come può essere collegato al trattato?

translation.en: It didn't.
Lynn was helping to make sure I chose well
translation.it: Lynn mi ha aiutato a scegliere bene

translation.en: when picking out the most important gift I'll offer you.
translation.it: il regalo più importante che ti avrei offerto.

translation.en: I wanted to wait until tomorrow, but...
translation.it: Volevo aspettare fino a domani, ma...

translation.en: Melissa, my love...
Although I'm undeserving of such an honor,
translation.it: Anche se non merito questo onore,

translation.en: will you marry me?
-[whimsical instrumentals] -Yes! Yes. -Yes! -[laughter]
[Richard] Congratulations.
Congratulations, Simon.
[Emily] Congratulations, Melissa.
You could have done worse. Oh, that's a ringing endorsement. [chuckles]
translation.it: - Avresti potuto fare di peggio. - È un'approvazione convinta.

translation.en: Don't let it get to your head.
I see a royal title in your future, Simon.
translation.it: Vedo un titolo reale nel tuo futuro, Simon.

translation.en: Perhaps Duke?
I accept.
This is such wonderful news. I'm so happy for you.
translation.it: È una notizia meravigliosa. Sono felice per voi.

translation.en: But we're running out of time. It's nearly midnight
translation.it: Ma non c'è più tempo. È quasi mezzanotte

translation.en: and there's a treaty to sign.
translation.it: e c'è un trattato da firmare.

translation.en: -Quickly. -[Queen Ming] Yes.
We must allow the time for the Queens to sign as well.
translation.it: Dobbiamo dare anche alle regine il tempo per firmarlo.

translation.en: There's always time to make history.
translation.it: C'è sempre tempo per fare la storia.

translation.en: [sharp exhale] But not too much time.
Your Majesty, King Tai.
The visiting monarch signs first.
translation.it: Prima firma il monarca in visita.

translation.en: After you, my Queen.
You have made me and all of Penglia very proud.
translation.it: Hai reso me e tutta Penglia molto orgogliosi.

translation.en: At the hour of 11:59, on December the 24th in the year 2019,
I declare the truce and treaty
translation.it: dichiaro la tregua e il trattato

translation.en: between the kingdoms of Aldovia and Penglia
translation.it: tra i regni di Aldovia e Penglia

translation.en: executed,
ratified and renewed for the next 100 years.
translation.it: ratificati e rinnovati per i prossimi 100 anni.

translation.en: We made it.
-[exhales] -Merry Christmas.
-Happy anniversary. -[cheery instrumentals]
Merry Christmas, everyone.
-Merry Christmas! -[excited chatter]
-Merry Christmas, Mrs. Averill. -[laughs]
I think it's time.
-[Amber exhales] -Everyone except the father, out.
The royal baby is ready to make its entrance.
translation.it: Il royal baby è pronto a fare il suo ingresso.

translation.en: Okay.
-Yes. -[Dr. Magoro] Thank you.
translation.it: - Può spostarlo? - Sì. Grazie. Va bene.

translation.en: Okay.
[clicks tongue] Congratulations.
A healthy, beautiful baby.
translation.it: Sta bene ed è di una bellezza unica.

translation.en: [exhales] Thank goodness.
Well done, Amber.
Queen Amber, King Richard,
may I present to you the future monarch of Aldovia,
translation.it: vi presento la futura sovrana di Aldovia,

translation.en: your daughter.
[chuckles] Hi.
She's beautiful.
She's incredible.
Just like her mother.
Thank you.
Amber and I
are the proud parents...
of a new...
baby girl.
I knew it was a girl.
-Congratulations. -Thank you.
Your father would be overjoyed if he were here.
translation.it: Madre. Tuo padre sarebbe felicissimo, se fosse qui.

translation.en: Mr. Zabala, champagne for the baby girl!
translation.it: Signor Zabala, champagne per la bambina!

translation.en: Girl? Did I just hear I have a granddaughter?
translation.it: Bambina? Ho appena saputo che ho una nipote?

translation.en: Merry Christmas, everyone.
I fought my way onto the first flight.
translation.it: Ho combattuto per prendere il primo volo.

translation.en: You're just in time to meet her. Mother, Rudy.
translation.it: Giusto in tempo per conoscerla. Madre, Rudy.

translation.en: Pop, you made it.
How's my little peanut? Never better.
translation.it: - Come sta la mia nocciolina? - Mai stata meglio.

translation.en: Meet your granddaughter, Elleri.
You named her after mom.
-You're perfect. -[laughs]
-Here. -Ooh!
Come to grandpa.
-[Amber] She likes you. -[Rudy laughs]
[Rudy] Yeah.
translation.it: Scusate, dobbiamo pesare la bambina. Grazie.

translation.en: Such a beautiful name.
Beautiful baby. Congratulations.
The plane is standing by.
We can be back in Penglia by sunrise to enjoy Christmas with your children.
translation.it: Possiamo tornare a Penglia all'alba per goderci il Natale con i vostri figli.

translation.en: Go home, be with your family.
And Ming...
thank you for everything.
Thank you.
Call me anytime.
Even better, bring your little one for a visit.
translation.it: Anzi, porta in visita la tua bambina.

translation.en: We can discuss our programs for mothers in person.
translation.it: Parleremo di persona dei nostri programmi per le madri.

translation.en: I'd love to.
[King Tai] King Richard, it's been an adventure.
[Queen Ming] A Penglian symbol of mother's nurturing strength.
translation.it: Un simbolo pengliano della forza amorevole della madre.

translation.en: It's yours now.
Are you sure?
Queen Amber of Aldovia,
you are going to be a wonderful mother.
Thank you.
Today, her Royal Highness, Queen Amber of Aldovia,
translation.it: Oggi, Sua Altezza Reale, la regina Amber di Aldovia,

translation.en: safely delivered a daughter,
translation.it: ha dato luce a una bambina,

translation.en: Princess Elleri Claire Charlton.
[woman 3] Come on, Princess!
[man 2] Congratulations.
I love our princess.
So do I.
I love you.
[Amber] I want to thank you all, my loyal readers,
translation.it: Voglio ringraziare tutti voi, miei fedeli lettori,

translation.en: for sharing this amazing journey with me.
translation.it: per aver condiviso questo incredibile viaggio con me.

translation.en: I couldn't be more grateful.
On behalf of Richard, myself, Elleri and the Royal family of Aldovia,
translation.it: A nome di Richard, mio, di Elleri e della famiglia reale di Aldovia,

translation.en: we wish you all a very Merry Christmas
translation.it: auguriamo a tutti un buon Natale

translation.en: and a Happy New Year.
